As a feature of our office housekeeping, our staff assists in organizing, reorganizing, and stacking the stationery at the workspace. This includes dusting bookshelves, arranging file cabinets, drawers, dusting keyboards, telephones, etc.'},{title:'Management of Eating Areas and Pantry',desc:'Most offices have lunchrooms.
